title: Warning Alert with Iframe
description: Show important info live interrupting playback in case of emergency! Our Iframe lets you display content in an iframe.

title: Picture-in-Picture Sign Language Video
description: Make content accessible for everyone adding sign language interpretation to your videos using Picture-in-Picture mode.

title: Overlay Video of Logo
description: Make your brand stand out with a logo overlay on your videos! Perfect for promos and presentations.

title: Ads Overlay
description: Monetize your content seamlessly by displaying ads directly over your videos.

title: Interactive Overlay
description: Add interactive elements to your videos and expand the possibilities with clickable overlays.
